::Slayer::

Slayer listens to several of the comms, picking up a distress signal 
near the CF (Megan's mole char), but nothing else. Attacking near the 
CF wouldn't be smart, so he passes the signal by and keeps listening. 
The merchant's introductory comm begins to be played back by the 
computer.
